pullrequest.title: added ode gearbox constraint with error correction

content.raw: I think that the code following the `return` statements in these unimplemented functions should be removed.  I imagine that the code was left here to remind us how to implement them later, but it's confusing to see dead code like that (and I imagine that our code checker would complain if we were to run it on these sources).  Presumably good example code remains in other joints (e.g., this one seems to have been copied from the hinge joint).
content.html: I think that the code following the return statements in these unimplemented functions should be removed. I imagine that the code was left here to remind us how to implement them later, but it's confusing to see dead code like that (and I imagine that our code checker would complain if we were to run it on these sources). Presumably good example code remains in other joints (e.g., this one seems to have been copied from the hinge joint).
